product_name: Helly Hansen Granville Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: When your travels take you to rainy climates, pull out the packable women's Helly Hansen Granville jacket for superb protection against rain. Durable Helly Tech(R) ripstop nylon shell utilizes a waterproof, breathable polyurethane laminate for dependable protection from wind and water. Underarm vents are designed for heat release during times of higher activity. Adjustable cuffs, hem and hood provide an effective storm seal; hem drawcord pulls from pockets for a clean finish. Features 2 zippered handwarmer pockets. Front storm flap helps protects you from the elements. Closeout.
short_description: When your travels take you to rainy climates, pull out the packable women's Helly Hansen Granville jacket for superb protection against rain.
